name: Startup Grave
storyline: Maya and her friends found a gate to the Earth to escape from the underworld but monsters of the underworld are not happy with this escape plan. Along 48 cards, we need to fight with underworld monsters that are trying to keep us from reaching the Earth. In this journey, prevent our health bar to run out and keep the monsters’ trouble bar low. You can either face the damage or challenge a monster to the battle. You can also be stronger in the battle by unlocking new cards using the points you win.
summary:
Startup Grave is a solo card game with turn based battle system.
Every deck gives you 4-5 minutes playtime and it's designed to be played everywhere easily. Also, engaging gameplay you are looking for is more rich with catchy music and stylish character drawings.
